name: It Has A Beard
description:
I recently experimented with a Gen 1 Tamagotchi and as such felt inspired to participate with this week's theme.

How to Play

You simply need to clean up poos to hit the win condition. Hit the walls or miss a certain number of poos however and you'll lose.

Use your WASD keys, ARROW keys or your controller's left analogue stick to move the virtual pet around. Then collide with the spawning poos to clean them up.
